locally.translation[0].definitions[0].de: in or near the area where you are, or the area you are talking about
locally.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: I live locally, so it’s easy to get to the office.
locally.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Most of the country will be dry, but there will be some rain locally.
locally.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: in or near the area where you are, or the area you are talking about
The restaurant only uses vegetables which are grown locally.
Police say they believe the man lives locally.
The villa has a private garden and there’s a swimming pool close by.
in or near the place where you are
Is there a bank around here?
in the area of the town where you are, or that you are talking about
Are there good schools in the neighborhood?
in the particular area of the country where you are, or that you are talking about
There aren’t many foxes in these parts.
He’s known around these parts as the ‘bag man’ because of the bag he always carries with him.
